dataset_id: ABoVE: Ignitions, burned area and emissions of fires in AK, YT, and NWT, 2001-2015
title: ABoVE: Ignitions, burned area and emissions of fires in AK, YT, and NWT, 2001-2015
summary: This data set provides estimates of daily burned area, carbon emissions and uncertainty, and daily fire ignition locations for boreal fires in Alaska, USA, and the Yukon and Northwest Territories, Canada. The data are at 500-m resolution for the period 2001 to 2015.

citation: Veraverbeke, S., B.M. Rogers, M.L. Goulden, R.R. Jandt, C.E. Miller, E.B. Wiggins, and J.T. Randerson. 2017. Lightning as a major driver of recent large fire years in North American boreal forests. Nature Climate Change. 7(7):529-534.
